text: The Lusatian Neisse is a river in the Czech Republic (Lužická Nisa), Germany (Lausitzer Neiße) and Poland (Nysa Łużycka). It flows into the Oder and is part of the Oder-Neisse line. ==Other websites== Category:Rivers of the Czech Republic Category:Rivers of Brandenburg Category:Rivers of Saxony Category:Rivers of Poland
title: Lusatian Neisse
